info.author: Sophie Friedl
info.description: calculates readout for every sample in a project from recount.
info.paperDescription: Normalized readcounts for genes, upstream regions and downstream regions were calculated from the bigwigfiles provided by the Recount2 project.

param.name: projectID
param.description: project id of a sra project indexed in recount2, it is possible to pass several project ids separated by ,

param.name: projectFile
param.restrictions: file exists, mutually exclusive with projectID
param.description: file with one line giving project ids (file content = all allowed values for projectID)

param.name: geneTSV
param.description: tab-separated file with genes, cooridantes, exonic basepairs and upstream and downstream regions (requires a line with column names chr, geneid, exonic_bps, upstream_start, upstream_end, downstream_start and downstream_end)

param.name: outfolder
param.description: folder for saving final results, creates a subfolder for the project with a table of coverage values for every sample in the project

param.name: tmpfolder
param.description: folder for saving temporary data, creates a subfolder for the project (named projectID)

param.name: removeTmpSampleData
param.description: if this flag is set, temporary files for samples are deleted at the end (default behaviour)

param.name: removeTmpProjectData
param.description: if this flag is set, temporary files for projects are deleted at the end (default behaviour)

param.name: threads
param.description: number of threads to use, equivalent to number of samples processed in parallel

param.name: downloadParallel
param.description: if this flag is set, big wig files are downloaded by in parallel (default: not set)

param.name: localRecountFolder
param.description: folder that can contain locally processed or already downloaded recount data; structure: projectID/rse_gene.Rdata and projectID/bw/sampleID.bw
